title: Spy message / Secret agent message
content:
[Spy message font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415101101/http:/3.bp.blogspot.com/-_eLPtEDCxbA/UVSmWM8F6jI/AAAAAAAAIMk/0pkJ34_Ab-I/s1600/activity+collage.jpg)

Thanks for your help, folks! Would like to use this font for my 7 year old daughter's spy-themed party decorations. I only have access to MS Word, so I hope it is a Word-compatible font!
author: tlogirl
